scriptedEmail.name: Forum No Permission
scriptedEmail.description: Sends an email when a user tries to post via email to a forum but doesn't have permission.
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Body_Introduction">Unfortunately, you don't currently have permission to post in this forum, so your message doesn't appear in it.</resource> <resource name="Body_JoinlessGroup">If you think you should have permission to post here, please {contact_link} for further options.</resource> <resource name="Body_OtherGroup">You can obtain group membership by going to {group_name_link} and applying to join the group.</resource> <resource name="Body_PublicOpenGroup">You can obtain group membership by going to {group_name_link} and clicking "Join Group" in its banner.</resource> <resource name="Contact">contact the group owner</resource> <resource name="Subject">Message not posted: permission denied</resource> <resource name="Header">Message not posted: permission denied</resource> </language>
